Topic.Title: Cannot see the rock for the forest path

Posts.EditableText:
Hi all. I've followed the instructions for the attached tutorial: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/guides/scenery.html

I have a rock as an object on one of the paths, as well as a tree object in the 'Master Forest'. 
When I then play the game, I get this:

>You are on a forest path.
You can see a tree, a forest path, a forest path, a forest path(containing a rock), a forest path and a forest path.

>take rock
The forest path is not open

I realise that by making the rooms transparent, the problem has been created, but it would be great to have to describe the tree object only the once. 

Has anyone done anything similar.
